item.title: C0mm4nd$ h3l1p!
item.dc:creator: @devull devull
item.description:
@devull wrote:

[code][code]arrrgh use code tags…
here is it in code tags

first open your client.java and press CTRL + F and then type

if (command.startsWith

then just above that add
[/code]if (command.startsWith(“COMMAND NAME”))
{
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: C0mm4nd$ h3l1p!
item.dc:creator: @death89 death89
item.description:
@death89 wrote:

if u want ::sweet then type
if (command.startsWith(“sweet”))
{
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
}
then for which items u want u go on mopar and pick an item then right click on it and there should be number like this (1050) or somethin if u want santa hat its 1050, so on item id u put 1050,then for itemnumber u put how many u want to apear, and u made a command, also u gotta get more item id numbers[br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2007, 02:55:38 PM[/size][hr]did it work?? oh and also theres somethin with the items, lets say u wanted santa hat when u type ::sweet to be 999m of santas hat, well instead of 1050 putting in item id u gotta put 1051 to item id then amount like 100000, for every item u gotta + 1 to the item so it will be noted like this
if (command.startsWith(“sweet”))
{
addItem(1051, 1000000);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
addItem(ITEMID, ITEMNUMBER);
}
and the santas when u type sweet will be alot

Read full topic
